contractURI().details: This function SHOULD return the URI for this contract in JSON format, starting with  header `data:application/json;`.  See https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-3525 for the JSON schema for contract URI.
contractURI().notice: Returns the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for the current ERC3525 contract.

returns._0: The JSON formatted URI of the current ERC3525 contract

valueDecimals().notice: Get the number of decimals the token uses for value - e.g. 6, means the user  representation of the value of a token can be calculated by dividing it by 1,000,000.  Considering the compatibility with third-party wallets, this function is defined as  `valueDecimals()` instead of `decimals()` to avoid conflict with ERC20 tokens.

returns._0: The number of decimals for value
